msg: Sequential (non-M/R) cmdline job to turn SequenceFile<Text,VectorWritable> into a pair of SequenceFile<IntWritable,VectorWritable> and SequenceFile<IntWritable,Text>.

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1097 Detachment processing of our proxied mutable types (Date, Timestamp, etc) needs to be consistent as EM.clear() was not unproxying JavaTypes.OBJECT fields but detach()/detachAll() were.  Thanks to Rick Curtis for the DetachManager changes.
